name: TronBall (Mimersbrond)
description:
Game Design Student, making a simple game for assignment.

There is a current bug, where the cylinder that gets created constantly in wrong rotations. Since the cylinder is not perfect smooth, this can make the ball jump unwillingly and with more power/speed the more wild the ball will react. I have tried many different methods in solving this, but none worked. So please don't get too mad and frustrated when this does make the game pretty unfair :P
